# identifiers

html form

input type could be text email radio checkbox submit and more

  <form action="">
    <div>
      Name: <input type="text" name="name">
    </div>
    <div>
      Email: <input type="email" name="email">
    </div>
    <div>
      Gender:
      <input type="radio" value="male">Male 
      <input type="radio" value="female">Female
    </div>
    <div>
      Skills: 
      <input type="checkbox" value="html">Html
      <input type="checkbox" value="css">css
      <input type="checkbox" value="js">js
    </div>
    <div>
      <input type="submit" value="register user">
    </div>
  </form>

recap html tag, attribute & attribute value

 <!-- html tag -->
html 
head
title
body
p
h (1-6)
ul
ol
li 
form
input
button
table
tr
th
td
a
img

 <!-- html attribute -->
border [number]
action [some page]
method [get, post]
input > type [text, email, file, submit, radio, checkbox]
href [some link]
src[image path]
id 
class
